data.title: Sabine SCHEUNERT on LinkedIn: #femaleleadership #femaletalent #weare3ds
data.meta_description:
Women Leading the Way: Networking in Stuttgart

What an inspiring evening! Under the theme "Leading the Change: Women at the Forefront of Transformation,"‚Ä¶ | 16 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
Reflections on the Women Automotive Network Europe 2023 Summit üé§ Looking back at last years Europe Summit, the feedback has been truly inspiring. It reinforces the significance of our efforts to support and uplift women in the automotive industry, particularly in leadership roles. Melanie Schuttenberg, Vice President at Flex, noted: "It is important to support Women in Automotive as we have not yet achieved an equal share, especially in management positions. Until this is a reality, we must continue to speak up." Andrea Seidel, Director of IT Infrastructure at Daimler Truck AG, commented on the atmosphere: "It‚Äôs hard to describe the special kind of energy and vibe present from the start of the conference. I met so many great, interesting, and powerful women." Watch a snippet of the highlights from last year here: https://lnkd.in/dkzhRefN These comments highlight the energising and empowering environment our summit creates. It‚Äôs more than just a conference; it's a community coming together to push for meaningful change and support each other in our professional journeys. üîú Don't miss out - follow the link to view this years agenda. https://lnkd.in/dK9U9jHj #WomenAutomotiveNetwork #EuropeSummit2023 #DiversityAndInclusion #AutomotiveIndustry #WomenAutomotiveNetwork #Sustainability #Innovation #Partnership #BetterTogether #WomenAutomotiveNetwork #WomeninAuto

üåü Join Us at the Women Automotive Network Europe Summit! üåü Get ready to be inspired by an exceptional lineup of speakers at this year‚Äôs Europe Summit. Our platform brings together some of the most influential figures in the automotive industry, who are not just leading the way but are driving significant change across the sector. Don‚Äôt miss the opportunity to hear from: ‚ñ∂ Linda Jackson, CEO of Peugeot, who has been at the forefront of automotive innovation and leadership. ‚ñ∂ Andrea Seidel, Member of the Supervisory Board & Director IT Infrastructure at Daimler Truck AG, known for her expertise in shaping digital infrastructure within the automotive landscape. ‚ñ∂ Fedra Ribeiro, Board Member for Cross Domain Computing and EVP at Bosch, who brings a wealth of knowledge in cross-functional technology integration. ‚ñ∂ Fran√ßois Dossa, Executive Director Strategy & Sustainability at JLR, who will share insights into integrating sustainability with corporate strategy. Each speaker will provide unique perspectives on navigating the complexities of the automotive industry, sharing their insights, experiences, and strategies for success. ‚û° Mark Your Calendars! This is your chance to engage with thought leaders, experts, and visionaries, and to gather invaluable insights that could shape your career and your understanding of the automotive industry. üé• Want a sneak peek? Watch the highlight reel from our 2023 Summit here: https://lnkd.in/dBKWYxPq üîó Link to register or learn more about the Europe Summit https://lnkd.in/ddNQ-26q #WomenAutomotiveNetwork #EuropeSummit #AutomotiveIndustry #Leadership #Innovation #Sustainability

Celebrating Women at GEA on International Women's Day üí™üåü Today, we shine a spotlight on several exceptional women who bring passion, expertise, and innovation to our #CoolestTeam: üë©üíª Olga B., Marketing Manager, brings years of experience and a strategic mindset to GEA. Her role includes communicating the value of our innovative solutions and engaging with customers to drive growth by creating strategic marketing campaigns. She explains what she particularly likes about GEA, ‚ÄúWomen should be interested in our industry because it offers diverse opportunities for professional growth, creativity, and making a meaningful impact on society. GEA provides a platform for women to showcase their talents and contribute to a better future.‚Äù üë©üíº Dr. Marie Steinbrecher, Assistant to our CEO and CFO, embarked on a significant career change to join GEA as we pursue a more sustainable future. About her career choice she explains, ‚ÄúIn choosing GEA, I made a huge change from an academic career to a whole new industry. I wanted to try something different. I was welcomed warmly and got to know so many talented and kind people and learned what it means to be part of a team working towards a common goal. Our team members are very supportive and there is always opportunity for growth.‚Äù üë©üîß Paz D√≠az Mu√±oz, Sales Support Engineer in GEA‚Äôs International Sales Department, joined us in Berlin three years ago. For Paz, the dynamic nature of our industry is what drew her in. She's proud to see more women breaking stereotypes and thriving in engineering. Paz describes her job, ‚ÄúI find fulfillment in combining technical expertise with interpersonal skills by working closely with clients and witnessing the impact of our products worldwide.‚Äù Inspired by her network of women in engineering from her academic and professional background, Paz's advice to young women is to embrace their capabilities and use doubt as fuel for success. At GEA, we celebrate the diversity, talent, and achievements of women. Together, we're shaping the future of our industry and making a meaningful impact on society, aligned with the company purpose of engineering for a better world. üåçüíº #InternationalWomensDay #WomenInSTEM #WomenEmpowerment #DiversityandInclusion

This International Women's Day, I want to share my deepest respect and heartfelt thanks to all the incredible women out there, especially those making waves in the automotive and engineering fields. Your brilliance, grit, and innovation aren't just pushing us forward but are also blazing a trail for a more inclusive and diverse workspace. Your relentless effort and dedication are shaping the future of our industry, showcasing the true power of innovation and resilience. Despite the hurdles, your successes stand as a testament to what can be achieved with sheer passion and steadfastness. Today, I also want to shine a spotlight on two remarkable women in our team, Ramona Racotea and Katy Maguire. Your amazing talents, dedication, and vision have been pivotal to our company's journey and ethos. You are not just leaders but also beacons of inspiration for your colleagues and the next wave of women in engineering and beyond. Let's take this International Women's Day as a reminder of the incredible strength, smarts, and creativity women contribute. Let's pledge to keep cheering each other on, celebrating our achievements, and working towards a world where every woman can reach her fullest potential without any hindrances. To every woman in our company, in the automotive and engineering world, and everywhere else, a huge thank you for your priceless contributions. Together, we're not just crafting machines and technologies; we're sculpting a more inclusive and better future for everyone. #internationalwomensday2024 #womeninengineering #womeninbusiness
